title: Paying For His Sins
description: Being a business man and part of the Riverfalls MC is not always fun you have to do things that you'd rather not do, but you can't let people think that it's okay to steal from us. Every single person I have dealt with are selfish bastards and only think of themselves and for the first time I'm going to take advantage of the situation and I'm going to keep Kate for myself and keep her safe even if she hates every minute of it.
author: Delia Petrano
